For Law 15-307, see notes following ยง 50-1331.01.

DC CODE ยง 50-1331.05

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: No Salvage Vehicle may be registered under subchapter I of Chapter 15 of this title.
Ownership of a Salvage Vehicle shall be transferred only through the use of a Salvage Title.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Salvage Title, Flood Notification, and Non-Repairable Vehicle Certification.

heading.catch_text: Restrictions on Use and Transfer of Salvage Vehicles.
